label: Convergence Design I
description: Elements: The convergence of theatre, architecture, and media are the common foundational experiences covered in this course. The fundamental elements of story, light, space, time, and human perception are explored through theoretical and practical projects with a strong emphasis on live performance. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: THEA 231, THEA 423, or graduate standing.
